sourcesContent:
<template>
	<v-card color="basil">
		<v-div class="subscription-form-container">
			<v-img class="subscription-image" src='https://cdn.vuetifyjs.com/images/cards/sunshine.jpg'></v-img>
			<SubscriptionForm />
		</v-div>
	</v-card>
</template>

<script>
import SubscriptionForm from '../components/SubscriptionForm.vue'

export default {
	name: 'HomePage',

	components: {
		SubscriptionForm
	}
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.subscription-form-container {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: flex-start; /* 이미지를 상단에 정렬 */
  height: 100%; /* Optional: Adjust height as needed */
  padding: 30px; /* Adjust the padding as needed */
}

.subscription-image {
  max-height: 300px; /* 이미지의 최대 높이 설정 */
  flex-grow: 0; /* 이미지가 늘어나지 않도록 설정 */
  flex-shrink: 0; /* 이미지가 줄어들지 않도록 설정 */
  align-self: flex-start; /* 이미지를 수직으로 상단에 정렬 */
}
</style>
